ArgString

The argument class used for string arguments.

Passes

A string value, defaulting to 0.

Variables
ArgString Variables

All these variables are optional, with sensible defaults.

Default

A string, defaults to _""_. If an argument is optional and unspecified, this value is used.

RestrictToCompletes

A boolean, defaults to false.  If true, the argument passed will /always/ be one of the arguments from the Completes table.

Completes

A list of strings or nil of auto-completes (suggestions) for the argument.
